data.title: First-Class Family Owned Jewelry Business
data.text: This is the place to invest in jewelry. My diamond and wedding band was purchased here in 1976 and they have serviced and cleaned my set over the years as well as changing the clasps on several necklaces.

data.title: Very Helpful and Excellent Service
data.text: My wife lost her diamond because a prog broke on her platinum ring. Luckily we found the diamond the next day! We took it to Mr. Bowen at Bowen Jewelry Company and they were able to rebuild the broken/damaged prongs. They also cleaned the ring. Very Helpful and courteous shop. Also, the repair was reasonably priced.
